Name: VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis
About the game: In this VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis game, you can have an immersive experience to travel through a black hole. What kind of unknown world did you reach after crossing? Start your adventure. In this game, there is a spaceship crash game. You need to get out of the spaceship and repair the spaceship in space. There is also a game of target shooting while playing a roller coaster in space. See if you manage to hit the target? Instructions: Right controller trigger button for selection; Left controller'Y' / Menu button for menu; Left thumbstick/touchpad for movement; Right thumbstick/touchpad press to control the up and down and rotation; When repairing the spacecraft, you need to touch the black smoke to repair it, and you need to repair all the positions. In the Space roller coaster session, hold down the left and right controllers grip buttons to grab the guns; press the trigger button to shoot, shake the left and right controllers to load bullets.
